alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lawrence and southeastern Sharp Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lynn, or near Lake Charles State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... College City... Portia... Strawberry... Lynn... Minturn... Annieville... Sedgwick... Smithville... Powhatan... Aetna... Strangers Home... Whiskerville... Calamine... Giles Spur... Nelsonville... Dicus... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 109 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
